articles.title: Nintendo ups its Switch game with big OLED screen - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: New model comes after a banner year when pandemic fueled play-at-home demand
articles.content:
OSAKA -- Nintendo announced Tuesday an improved Switch game system with a larger, better screen and more internal memory than the current versions.
The so-called OLED model of the Switch is due out … [+1570 chars]

articles.title: How Putin could jam up Biden’s post-Afghanistan plans - POLITICO
articles.description: The U.S. is looking at basing troops in Central Asia to help ensure Kabul doesn't fall. But Moscow is working to complicate the withdrawal.
articles.content: The dual questions of how to continue fighting terrorists and safeguard Afghans who worked with American forces after the U.S. withdrawal became more urgent on Friday, as the last U.S. troops left Ba… [+10072 chars]
